CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 24, 1959, page A1, reads: "Reckless Driving - About three o'clock Saturday morning, an unidentified driver plunged into the 1948 Buick (above), owned by Ernest Moore, 7803 Hamilton Ave., and side swiped a Chevvy [Chevy] owned by Mrs. Charlotte Lawson, 7805 Hamilton Ave. Mrs. Lawson stated that darkness prevented the victims from seeing the driver's car licence number or type of vehicle. Mr. Moore's car was damaged beyond repair - a complete loss. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Wrecked 1948 Buick car, with damaged grill, license plate "1942 Penna 41G6," and "AB" sign in windshield, parked along Hamilton Avenue, in Homewood
